author: rickmcguire
msg: GERONIMO-5090  Inconsistent handling of META-INF/services files by different Geronmo specs.
Additional support in the locator and registry and updates to all spec projects except for jpa.

author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-738. java: TCompactProtocol throws RuntimeException when it can't identify a type identifier
This patch causes it to throw TProtocolException instead.

author: psteitz
msg: * Added density functions to remaining continuous distributions (F, T, Weibull, Cauchy).
* Made Brent Solver (inverse cum) absolute accuracy configurable for all continuous distributions.
